title: Finding information
brief_description: In learning to raise a baby bird a boy gets information in a number of ways: by advice from “an authority”, by observation, by consulting reference materials in the library, by doing an informal experiment and by exploring community resources. Imparts an awareness of the process of learning and problem solving.
